name: juan ruiz
text: Nice people here.

name: AAron Finch
text: I go to this facility 3-4 times a day.  Sometimes it can get crowded with few, if any, spots to drop a trailer but the office personnel are very friendly and usually come up with viable solutions.  During those crowded times, patience is key to making your visit as smooth and easy as possible.

name: My Ru
text: Friendly  people and fast loads.

text: I think usda needs more help to do inspections on chicken because it holds up the workers to load trailers and for us drivers not to run out of time

text: If there was a possibility do a negative 5 star they would deserve it 4:30 p.m. appointment didnt start loading until 12 a.m. in the morning got told at 8:30 pm got the load got passed for the USDA inspection that they would start loading me soon.

text: Very unprofessional, why make appointments only to make the driver wait 7 hrs. Complete lack of respect and responsibility. Zero stars and total embodiment of what our country lacks, pay me but I only do the minimum.

name: Ruth Godwin
text: Midgard Self Storage is well-managed, clean and has generous access hours and courteous, helpful staff. They also give clear comments as to rules and protocol.

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Guest, the team of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama thank you for taking your valuable moving time to give the highest 5 star rating for the courteous, helpful, thorough customer service in providing a clean, secure facility for your possessions.  Thank you  for sharing your very positive experience with the courteous and helpful team from the lease explanation to a rapid move in process at Midgard Self Storage in Florence Alabama.

name: Paige Thornton
text:
We currently lease 4 units at Midgard Storage , 1015 North Glendale Avenue in Florence, Alabama. Your manager, Dave Weaver, is one of the strongest reasons we have stayed with you and gone from one to four.
He is always willing to work with us on anything. It is like we are part of the same company. He trains his people the same way. He is a jewel. We hope you recognize the extraordinary person you have, and we thank you!
Paige Thornton. Designer
Beth Lane
Design Assistant

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Guest, Dave and the team of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama sincerely thank you for for your continued and expanded usage of our clean, secure facility. Dave has been doing this beginning in Florida and we appreciate you noting his outstanding, professional management abilities. Thank you again for sharing your consistent, positive experience with Dave, the growing team and the many benefits available at Midgard Self Storage on Glendale Street in Florence Alabama.

name: Blair Thornton
text:

Paige Thornton,
Designer

text: Move in was a super quick and easy process. This place takes pride in their security! The man at the front desk was super helpful and was able to answer all of my questions!

Thank you for sharing your terrific experience with the team and the many benefits available at Midgard Self Storage in Glendale Street in Florence Alabama.

name: Trent Putman
text: I showed up no notice and didn't have an exact idea of the size I needed. Karah was patient and went ahead and took me to three available rooms and let me decide from there. Then she helped me arrange a truck drop-off to save me money when I move, which I had no idea was an option. Incredible.

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer, Karah and the team of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 North Glendale Street in Florence Alabama thank you so much for taking your valuable moving time to give the highest 5 star experience rating and kind comments regarding professional, patient and knowledgeable customer care including assisting you in saving money for your UHAUL truck drop off.  We are happy that you were able to get the correct sized clean, secure self-storage unit for your needs as well as having the added benefit of 24 hour 7 day a week access to your possessions.  Thank you so much for sharing your incredible experience with Karah's professional customer care and the many benefits available at Midgard Self Storage in Florence Alabama.  We truly appreciate the opportunity to meet your UHAUL and self-storage needs.

name: Poseidon Master
text:
I have visited U-hauls throughout the Shoals area and in many different states and I can now conclusively say that Karah at this location is bar none the best manager at any U-haul location that I have visited in over 15 years of having rented from U-haul.  She consistently goes out of her way to ensure that the customer has a pleasant experience and a smooth transaction with no task being considered too lowly for a manager to perform doing everything from skillfully handling U-hauls computer systems in record time, to even offering to help me to hook up a trailer in the rain!  If U-haul does not promote her to the corporate team soon, it will be a huge mistake on their part.

I also have to mention Britney at this location who I have known for just a little less time than Kara.  Britney goes above and beyond in every transaction to see to it that my rental is in tip top shape and consistently has been first on the scene to help me to unhitch my trailer as soon as I arrive.  Brittney has the skills the knowledge, the personality to keep this location running like a greased wheel as a manager when Kara is promoted to corporate so U-haul what are you waiting for.

I will have to recruit both of these amazing workers myself if your team doesn't choose quickly to make use of their amazing potential. I would consider the customer service at this U-haul location with these two team members to be the absolute best in the entire Shoals area. They are both a shining example of the customer service that this town is so desperately lacking.  It is rare to stumble across one worker like Brittney who enjoys what she does and does it well, it is even more rare to find a manager like Kara who does the same all while maintaining a productive and pleasant workplace for her team!

When you visit this place, tell them Lee sent you!

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer, Karah and Brittany  of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama truly thank you for taking your valuable move time to not only award the highest 5 star experience rating for "over the to", consistent customer service in meeting your UHUAL needs in a rapid, accurate manner, but for your kind comments regarding honest, helpful customer care in a productive, pleasant environment assisting you in unhitching your trailer as soon as you arrive at the facility.  Your comments are greatly appreciated and so true as to it being rare to find such terrific customer care as given by Karah and Brittany.  Thank you so much for sharing your very satisfying experience with the team at Midgard Self Storage in Florence.

name: Hailey K
text: The facility is very secure and staff is friendly. They have moving dollies available to move things into your unit as well as a utility elevator. The storage area can't be accessed unless you have a code, units have locks, and there are cameras. I definitely trust that my belongings will be safe there.

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Guest, the team of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama thank you for taking your valuable move time to give the highest 5 star experience rating for friendly, experienced customer service, site cleanliness and terrific security with your own keypad codes, locks, cameras and more and the added convenience of 24 hour 7 day a week access to your protected possessions as well as UHAUL trucks. resp.text: I’m sorry to discredit your opinion, but according to my records you do not and have not ever rented a unit from us. Also, we keep our gates locked to keep non renters off of the premises. name: Crow Bro
text: I had never rented a storage unit before, and had SO many questions, but Courtney was absolutely amazing! She helped me through every step of the process, and answered all of my questions with professionalism, courtesy, and absolutely wonderful customer service. I am not storing anything that would necessarily be of much value to many people, but it still gave me a great sense of security knowing that she is always on site looking out for my belongings and those of other tenants. She made me feel very confident not only in her abilities in her job, but also in the care and respect that she shows to tenants at Midgard. She was super friendly, a great conversationalist, and definitely set the bar for any future self-storage experiences I may have in the future. She is an absolute gem!

name: Case Robertson
text: The staff is excellent but the company has a policy to not accept cash. I would stay with them because of the friendly staff but not accepting cash is un-American.

resp.text: Dear Case Robertson, we thank you for mentioning that Midgard does not take cash at this time.  The reason spans from the current COVID pandemic, thus keeping both our customers and employees safe from handling cash to safety at the facility with no cash on site.  We do apologize for your immediate inconvenience and appreciate your input and we appreciate you as our customer and will do everything possible to protect you, our employees and your possessions.

text: Amazing first U-haul rental! The guy was so helpful and explained everything very well! He also put the dolly in the truck and pulled it up from the spot for me! I would highly recommend this location to anyone looking to rent a U-haul!

resp.text: Dear Kaleigh,  the staff at Midgard Self Storage located at 4450 Chisholm Rd in Florence, AL sincerely thank you for awarding the highest 5 star experience rating for outstanding customer care in meeting your UHAUL needs and having the necessary equipment placed in your truck in order to meet your moving needs.  Thank you for permitting Midgard  to be your UHAUL dealer of choice.  We look forward to meeting your UHAUL as well as packing supply, locks, boxes and self-storage needs.

name: Chandler Bridges
text: Okay, let me start by saying I have moved many many times. I have also had storage units for over 25 years and in all sizes, shapes, and locations. This facility in little old Florence is by far the absolute best experience I have ever had. Not only with the storage units (clean, well lit, safe, 24 hour access), but also in that this location is a U-haul renter. I have rented 10 foot, 15 foot, and 26 foot trucks with ease multiple times from these nice folks in my two years here in Florence. Also, I have taken two 12 foot trailers and a 26 foot truck on one-way adventures. Every time the equipment is ready and the service is super fast. Alex the on-site manager is by far the nicest and most accommodating employee I have ever met at a place like this. It is always a pleasure to go in and see him. Leah, his competent co-worker, is equally as pleasant and adept at getting the job done for the customer with ease. I really can’t speak highly enough about the staff at this fantastic location. I hope if Alex ever leaves this job he would consider working for me, because I know and appreciate the value of an employee that not only cares about the customer’s business but also values the interactions with them as well. Well stocked, honest, considerate and caring sums up this Chisholm road location. They get my highest recommendation.

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer - the staff of Midgard Self Storage on Chisholm Road in Florence Alabama sincerely thank you for providing the highest rating for customer service, cleanliness, security and 24x7 access to your RV equipment.  We sincerely appreciate you as a customer and know you took valuable time to provide this highest review and very kind words.  They are most appreciated and we thank you and look forward to continuing to meet your self-storage needs.
